name: We Wanted It To Be A Visual Novel
name_original: We Wanted It To Be A Visual Novel
description:
We Wanted It To Be A Visual Novel

we made this as part of the kiwi jam 2019 with the theme chain reaction

This is a people management game where you have to organize a small town of Dinos into thriving and growing there town while maintaining food and your wealth

Goal: The current goal is just to survive as long as possible by keeping your population above zero. you do this by keeping your food and income up by assigning your population to jobs
